SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.client

Class ClientController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.ClientController
public class ClientController extends Object
the ClientController class manages the client: it re-directs requests between the view, the responseDecoder, the commandParsing and the network.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    ClientController(View currentView)
    constructor ClientController sets a new ClientController and initializes the view, the listener, the command parsing and the connection (RMI or Socket).

  • Constructor Details

    • ClientController

      public ClientController(View currentView)
      constructor ClientController sets a new ClientController and initializes the view, the listener, the command parsing and the connection (RMI or Socket). It also creates a new instance of CommandParsing
      Parameters:
      currentView - - the view of the client.

  • Method Details

    • getUsername

      public String getUsername()

    • setUsername

      public void setUsername(String username)

    • setUserToken

      public void setUserToken(String userToken)

    • isToClose

      public boolean isToClose()
      this boolean signals whether the connection needs to be closed or not
      Returns:
      boolean - signals if the connection needs to be closed

    • setToCLose

      public void setToCLose(boolean toCLose)

    • isGameOn

      public boolean isGameOn()
      this boolean is used on the client's side to know if a game has started or not
      Returns:
      boolean to know if the game has started

    • setGameOn

      public void setGameOn(boolean gameOn)

    • isConnected

      public boolean isConnected()

    • isMyTurn

      public int isMyTurn()
      this int is used on the client's side to know at which stage of the turn they are playing
      Returns:
      0 when it's not the client's turn, 1 when they are choosing tiles, 2 if they are either choosing a column or re-arranging the tiles

    • setMyTurn

      public void setMyTurn(int turn)

    • setupConnection

      public void setupConnection()
      method setupConnection sets up the connection of the client, choosing between RMI and Socket. To initialize the connection, it asks the server IP and then it calls the method setupRMI or setupSocket.

    • setupSocket

      public void setupSocket(String serverIP, int port)
      method setupSocket sets up the socket connection of the client. It creates a new instance of ClientSocket and it sets the view of the client and the response decoder.
      Parameters:
      serverIP - - the IP of the server caught from the view.
      port - - the port of the server caught from the view.

    • userLogin

      public void userLogin()
      method userLogin asks the username to the client's View

    • chooseTiles

      public void chooseTiles(List<String> tilesChosen)
      method to pass the chosen tiles from the view to the connection. It also passes the user's token
      Parameters:
      tilesChosen - - the list of tiles chosen by the user.

    • serverSavedUsername

      public void serverSavedUsername(String name, boolean b, String token, boolean first)
      method serverSavedUsername takes the reply of the server after the login and saves useful information for the future such as the token. If the login was not successful, the client will be asked to choose a new name.
      Parameters:
      name - - the name with which the client has logged in
      b - - boolean which signals whether the username is valid or not.
      token - - token assigned by the server to the client. It will be used for future requests to the server.
      first - - signals whether the client is the first player logging on, in which case they will need to create a waiting room.

    • numberOfPlayers

      public void numberOfPlayers(int number)
      method numberOfPlayers checks whether the input from the view is valid. If it is, it sends the number of players to the server so that it will create a waiting room.
      Parameters:
      number - - number of players of the next match, passed by the view.

    • chooseColumn

      public void chooseColumn(int column)
      method chooseColumn sends the column chosen by the user to the server.
      Parameters:
      column - - the column chosen by the user.

    • close

      public void close()
      method close closes the connection with the server.

    • askLogin

      public void askLogin(String s)
      askLogin method is invoked by the ResponseDecoder to send the username to the server.
      Parameters:
      s - - it's the username chosen by the client.

    • isItMyTurn

      public void isItMyTurn(String name)
      this method sets the turn parameter to 1 if the name of the current player is the same as the client's username.
      Parameters:
      name - - name of the current player passed by the server.

    • rearrangeTiles

      public void rearrangeTiles(List<String> multipleChoiceNumber)
      method rearrangeTiles passes the tiles re-arranged to the server.
      Parameters:
      multipleChoiceNumber - - list of re-arranged tiles passed by the view

    • nextAction

      public void nextAction(int num, ArrayList<Position> tiles)
      nextAction method used to change the state of the turn parameter from one to two when the choice of tiles has been deemed successful by the server.
      Parameters:
      num - - the stage at which the turn of the client is.
      tiles - - tiles passed from the server to the view so that the client can see them.

    • wrongCommand

      public void wrongCommand()

    • invalidNotMyTurn

      public void invalidNotMyTurn()

    • errorFormat

      public void errorFormat()
      method errorFormat used to print an error message when the format of the input is wrong.

    • errorNoSelection

      public void errorNoSelection(String s)
      method errorNoSelection used to print an error message when the user has not typed anything after the command.
      Parameters:
      s - - string which signals which error message to print (about selection of tiles, column or re-arranging).

    • wrongNumber

      public void wrongNumber()

    • gameNotStarted

      public void gameNotStarted()
      method gameNotStarted used to notify the client that the game has not started yet and therefore they cannot type commands

    • sendChat

      public void sendChat(String receiver, String message)
      sendChat method passes a message to the server.
      Parameters:
      receiver - - the receiver of the chat message.
      message - - text of the chat message.
